query:
INSERT INTO bdd_test_scenarios (epic_number, epic_name, scenario_number, scenario_title, given_context, when_action, then_outcome, additional_expectations, status, priority, implementation_location, test_coverage_method, expected_values, notes) VALUES
(27, 'PowerPoint Export Feature', '27.1', 'User downloads PowerPoint presentation from Results page', 'User has completed assessment and is on Results page', 'User clicks "Download PowerPoint" button', 'PowerPoint file (.pptx) downloads with filename {CompanyName}_Readiness_Assessment.pptx', 'File contains 12 slides with all assessment data, ProblemOps branding, professional formatting', 'PASSED', 'P1', 'client/src/lib/pptxGenerator.ts, client/src/pages/Results.tsx', 'Manual browser test', 'PPTX file, 12 slides, branded', 'PowerPoint generation using pptxgenjs library'),
(27, 'PowerPoint Export Feature', '27.2', 'PowerPoint includes all key metrics', 'User downloads PowerPoint presentation', 'Open the PPTX file', 'Slide 2 displays readiness score, dysfunction cost, ROI, savings, payback period', 'All metrics match Results page values exactly', 'PASSED', 'P0', 'client/src/lib/pptxGenerator.ts', 'Manual verification', 'Exact data match', 'Executive summary slide with 6 key metrics'),
(27, 'PowerPoint Export Feature', '27.3', 'PowerPoint includes 4Cs analysis with visual charts', 'User downloads PowerPoint presentation', 'Navigate to Slide 4', 'Slide displays Cohesion, Communication, Coordination, Cognition scores with progress bars and 85% target line', 'Visual representation matches Results page 4Cs chart', 'PASSED', 'P1', 'client/src/lib/pptxGenerator.ts (add4CsSlide)', 'Manual verification', 'Progress bars, target lines, percentages', '4Cs radar chart equivalent in PowerPoint format'),
(27, 'PowerPoint Export Feature', '27.4', 'PowerPoint includes all 7 driver scores', 'User downloads PowerPoint presentation', 'Navigate to Slide 5', 'Slide displays all 7 drivers with scores, progress bars, and percentages', 'Drivers sorted by score (lowest first), color-coded by performance', 'PASSED', 'P1', 'client/src/lib/pptxGenerator.ts (addDriverScoresSlide)', 'Manual verification', '7 drivers, sorted, color-coded', 'Horizontal bar chart showing driver performance'),
(27, 'PowerPoint Export Feature', '27.5', 'PowerPoint includes training recommendations', 'User downloads PowerPoint with specific training type selected', 'Navigate to Slide 9', 'Slide displays selected training option, focus areas, investment, and expected ROI', 'Training details match selected option from assessment', 'PASSED', 'P1', 'client/src/lib/pptxGenerator.ts (addTrainingSlide)', 'Manual verification', 'Training option, cost, ROI', 'Training recommendation slide with value proposition'),
(27, 'PowerPoint Export Feature', '27.6', 'Download button disabled during generation', 'User is on Results page', 'User clicks "Download PowerPoint" button', 'Button shows "Generating..." text and becomes disabled', 'Status message displays "Generating PowerPoint presentation. Please wait..."', 'PASSED', 'P2', 'client/src/pages/Results.tsx (handleDownloadPowerPoint)', 'Code review', 'Disabled state, loading text', 'Prevents multiple simultaneous downloads'),
(27, 'PowerPoint Export Feature', '27.7', 'Error handling for PowerPoint generation failure', 'PowerPoint generation encounters an error', 'Generation fails', 'User sees alert "Failed to generate PowerPoint presentation. Please try again." and status message updates', 'Button re-enables after error, user can retry', 'PASSED', 'P2', 'client/src/pages/Results.tsx (handleDownloadPowerPoint catch block)', 'Code review', 'Error alert, status update, button re-enable', 'Graceful error handling with user feedback');
command:
